references.A95BAN01NAUS: Banks, R. C., and M. R. Browning. 1995. Comments on the status of revived old names for some North American birds. Auk 112:633-648.
references.B68BEN01NAUS: Bent, A. C. 1968. Life histories of North American cardinals, grosbeaks, buntings, towhees, finches, sparrows, and allies; order Passeriformes: family Fringillidae. Dover Publications, New York. Bull. U.S. Nat. Mus. 237.
references.B97NIC01NCGP: Nicholson CP. 1997. Atlas of the breeding birds of Tennessee. Knoxville: University of Tennessee Press.
references.B83AOU01USGP: American Ornithologists' Union (AOU). 1983. Check-list of North American Birds, 6th edition. Allen Press, Inc., Lawrence, Kansas. 877 pp.
references.B99HAL01SEGP: Halkin, S.L. and S.U. Linville. 1999. Northern cardinal (Cardinalis cardinalis). In A. Poole and F. Gill, eds., The Birds of North America, No. 440. The Academy of Natural Sciences, Philadelphia and The American Ornithologists' Union, Washington, DC.
references.B87PRA01NAUS: Pratt, H.D., P.L. Bruner, and D.G. Berrett. 1987. A field guide to the birds of Hawaii and the tropical Pacific. Princeton University Press, Princeton, New Jersey. 409 pp. + 45 plates.
references.B92OSB01NAUS: Osborne, J. 1992. The cardinal. Univ. of Texas Press, Austin. 128 pp.
references.A94FIL01NAUS: Filliater, T. S., R. Breitwisch, and P. M. Nealen. 1994. Predation on northern cardinal nests:does choice of nest site matter? Condor 96:761-768.
references.B80POT01NAUS: Potter, E. F., J. F. Parnell, and R. P. Teulings. 1980. Birds of the Carolinas. Univ. North Carolina Press, Chapel Hill. 408 pp.
references.B88EHR01NAUS: Ehrlich, P.R., D.S. Dobkin, and D. Wheye. 1988. The birder's handbook:a field guide to the natural history of North American birds. Simon and Shuster, Inc., New York. xxx + 785 pp.
references.B80TER01NAUS: Terres, J.K. 1980. The Audubon Society encyclopedia of North American birds. Alfred A. Knopf, New York.
references.B78HAR01NAUS: Harrison, C. 1978. A field guide to the nests, eggs and nestlings of North American birds. Collins, Cleveland, Ohio.
references.B79HAR01NAUS: Harrison, H.H. 1979. A field guide to western birds' nests. Houghton Mifflin Company, Boston. 279 pp.
